definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
intercalary/an extra day or month inserted into the lunar or solar calendar (such as February 29)
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
Chow Yun-Fat (1955-), Hong Kong TV and film star
to permeate/to percolate/fig. to saturate (with emotion)
Fengrun district of Tangshan city 唐山市[Tang2 shan1 shi4], Hebei
to polish (a piece of writing)/to add a few finishing touches to (a piece of writing, painting etc)

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE:To investigate the defection dynamics of Yiqi Runchang Liquid in treating asthenic-type constipation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨益气润肠液对虚证便秘肛肠动力的作用。

sentences.english: What is the Bump-and-Run Pattern Saying about the Short-term Price for Silver?
sentences.chinese: 什么是凹凸和润模式大约为银短期价格在说什么？

sentences.english: Tanizaki Jun ichirou is the representative writer in Japanese aestheticism movement.
sentences.chinese: 谷崎润一郎是日本唯美主义文学流派的代表作家。

sentences.english: Winter wind semantic cold, Warm spring rain embellish mind sweet.
sentences.chinese: 寒冬风吹语意冷，暖春雨润心思甜。

sentences.english: I applied sunscreen with SPF 30 and took out my silk- padded quilt to the roof.
sentences.chinese: 我涂上防晒指数三十的润面霜，把丝棉被拿到天台晒。

sentences.english: Buy a good conditioner and use it regularly.
sentences.chinese: 常使用一些好的润发乳。

sentences.english: Wet heat merging into air, the ideal of lines long lost with the light.
sentences.chinese: 濡润的体热融化于空气，假想的线条久已消亡于光芒。

sentences.english: Mood now like besmear in the hands of embellish hand cream.
sentences.chinese: 现在的心情就像涂在手上的润手霜。

sentences.english: Tanizaki Junichiro is a typical aestheticism writer in Japanese literature history.
sentences.chinese: 谷崎润一郎是日本唯美主义文学流派的代表作家。

sentences.english: I put conditioner on my hair.
sentences.chinese: 我把润发乳抹在头发上。

sentences.english: Some pomade will be helpful to your dry hair.
sentences.chinese: 擦些润发脂对您干燥的头发有益。

sentences.english: Pandas eat have to drink water embellish throat dragon.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫吃饱饱了还得喝水润润喉龙。

sentences.english: Everybody to save a drop of water, formed a clear spring embellish the world.
sentences.chinese: 人人节约一滴水，汇成清泉润世界。
擦些润发油或发乳，好吗？

sentences.english: The greenness of grass can not be seen but afar.
sentences.chinese: 天街小雨润如酥，草色遥看近却无。

definition: clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
to arrive/to reach (esp. perfection)/utmost/(used in commercials)
luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
